title: Rightwards Pushing Hand Medium Skin Tone
description: Represents a hand pushing something away or indicating a boundary, with a medium skin tone. It can signify resistance, refusal, or the act of pushing an object to the right.
apple_vendor_description: The rightwards pushing hand emoji on Apple devices features a hand with a medium skin tone, depicted with a dynamic, forward motion. Apple's design imbues this emoji with a tactile feel through its glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting, making the gesture appear strong and decisive. Its soft rounded edges contribute to a friendly yet firm appearance, commonly used to signify moving forward, pushing for progress, or indicating agreement and approval.
